mapper.sql: c.id, c.created_at, c.next_created_at, c.content, c.opinion, c.weather, c.time, c.deleted_at, c.counselee_id, c.member_id, ce.name as counselee_name, m.name as member_name
mapper.select: SELECT FROM counsel c LEFT JOIN counselee ce ON c.counselee_id = ce.id LEFT JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.id WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId} AND c.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY c.created_at DESC

SELECT FROM counsel c LEFT JOIN counselee ce ON c.counselee_id = ce.id LEFT JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.id WHERE c.counselee_id = #{counseleeId} AND c.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
SELECT FROM counsel c LEFT JOIN counselee ce ON c.counselee_id = ce.id LEFT JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.id WHERE c.id = #{id} AND c.deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT FROM counsel c LEFT JOIN counselee ce ON c.counselee_id = ce.id LEFT JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.id WHERE c.created_at BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND c.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY c.created_at DESC

SELECT FROM counsel c LEFT JOIN counselee ce ON c.counselee_id = ce.id LEFT JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.id WHERE c.next_created_at IS NOT NULL AND c.deleted_at IS NULL AND c.next_created_at > NOW() ORDER BY c.next_created_at ASC
